name: CONSUMER REPORTS, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Consumer Reports wants to operate the Energy Star Program which is currently administered by the EPA.
Consumer Reports would like to assume the operations and funding of the Energy Star Program which is currently Administered by the Environmental Protection Agency.
